name: graphql-language-service
description: An interface for building GraphQL language services for IDEs

0.0.0.name: graphql-language-service
0.0.0.description: GraphQL support, including .graphql file syntax highlighting

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.lint: eslint src || (printf '\033[33mTry: \033[7m npm run lint -- --fix \033[0m\n' && exit 1)
scripts.build: babel src --optional runtime --ignore __tests__ --out-dir dist/ && cp package.json dist/
